Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays.  Expect longer than normal wait times. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays.  Expect longer than normal wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
